title: The Amazing Spider-Man New Game ipod.ipad.iphone
description:
Description
Get ready for intense web-slinging action with the Amazing Spider-Man! Join Spidey in the official game app of this highly anticipated 2012 blockbuster! Play through the movie storyline as Spider-Man faces off against the Lizard and rampaging gangs. Web-sling and crawl your way through an open, fully 3D New York while using your amazing skills to save the city.

THE OFFICIAL GAME OF 2012Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s HIGHLY AWAITED SUPERHERO BLOCKBUSTER

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play the Amazing Spider-Man through more than 25 immersive missions inspired by the upcoming movie's storyline.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Climb, jump and web-sling from building to building for an aerial thrill like never before!

FREE NEW YORK CITY
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Explore the city through its five distinctive districts (Central Park, Business, Downtown, Pier and Residential)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ An exciting and enjoyable fighting system with melee, ranged, combo attacks and much more
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ A wide selection of upgrades to customize your style, attacks and skills

A HIGH PRODUCTION-VALUE GAME
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Explore an open-world Manhattan, teeming with action. Discover random missions, collectibles and more secrets in the City that Never Sleeps!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fight in a fully 3D New York City with cutting-edge graphics. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Advanced shaders and visual effects make Spider-Man more realistic than ever before!
